name: cbetar2
description: CBETA電子佛典閱讀器2(非官方)，使用CBETA API存取電子佛經。

scripts.dist-linux: npm run build && electron-builder -l deb rpm
scripts.dist-snap: npm run build && rm dist/*.snap && electron-builder -l snap
scripts.dist-mac: source appleAuth.sh && npm run build && electron-builder -m pkg -c mac.json
scripts.dist-mas: npm run build && electron-builder -m mas -c mas.json
scripts.build-mas-dev: npm run build && electron-builder -m mas-dev -c masDev.json
